form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY, I-539 ( (REV. 11-1-70)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/11/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE READ INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE RECFEE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED. Form approved Budget Bureau No. 43 - R0068 APPLICATION TO EXTEN FEE STAMP TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY NOV-9 PM I: :05 $10.00 FEE PAID No. 90-7 Immigration and Naturalization Service I&NS, BUFFALO, N.Y I HEREBY APPLY TO EXTEND MY TEMPORARY STAY IN Buffalo, N. Y. RAIS THE UNITED STATES Date 11/9/71 Verified by are 1. FAMILY NAME (Capital (SAVITRI) FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME FILE NUMBER MEHTA Letters) DEVI 7. DATE TO WHICH EXTENSION IS REQUESTED MARCH 72 2. OTHER NAMES (Include all pass and present names:marfied woman must give her maiden name) 8. REASON FOR COMING TO THE UNITED STATES 3. COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CITIZENSHIP 9. REASON FOR REQUESTING EXTENSION 3-10-1910 INDIA INDIA BEING WIDOWED 8 5. NONIMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION DATE ON WHICH AUTHORIZED STAY EXPIRES S-136 6. I AM AM NOT married. If you wish to apply for extension for your spouse and children, give the following: (See Instruction #1) NAMES OF SPOUSE AND CHILDREN DATE OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF BIRTH PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) or (Date NOTE: If spouse and children for whom you are seeking extension do not reside with you, give their complete address on a separate attachment to thistapplication 17. (Insert "Have" or "Have Not") I HAVE NOT BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED BUSINESS IN THE UNITEDSTATES. IF YOU HAVE BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES, COMPLETE THE REST OF THIBBLACK.A NAME AND ADRRESS OF EMPLOYER OR BUSINESS x KIND OF EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS INCOME PER WEEK DATES SUCH EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS BEGAN AND ENDED x 18. IF YOU ARE A TEMPORARY VISITOR FOR PLEASURE (B-2), COMPLETE THIS BLOCK. I HAVE DOLLARS IN THE UNITED STATES. I RECEIVE DOLLARS EACH FROM: (Day, Week, Month) (Name and Address) 19. MEMTA DATED Nov, 71 IN S OF THIS APPLICATION. I BELIEVE SUCH STATEMENT TO BE TRUE AND I MAKE IT PART OF THIS APPLICATION. (See Instruction 6.) I CERTIFY THAT THE ABOVE IS TRUE AND CORRECT SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE (11-7-71) I DECLARE THAT THIS DOCUMENT WAS PREPARED BY ME AT THE REQUEST OF THE APPLICANT AND IS BASED ON ALL INFORMATION OF WHICH ADDRESS LABEL FOR NOTICE OF ACTION ON APPLICATION ANY KNOWLEDGE.
